resources.string: 1. What part of the brain is newest, and is responsible for higher order thinking? Hint: Among species, mammals are the only ones with this.
2. What part of the brain is dormant while you sleep, and is the prevailing reason it can be so difficult to distinguish dreams from reality while dreaming?
3. What are the two main modes of thinking, as defined by Daniel Kahneman and Amos Tversky?
The argument that the motor system influences our cognition, just as the mind influences the body.
The argument that people determine their attitudes and preferences by interpreting the meaning of their own behavior.
That facial movement can influence emotional experience.
